description:
Designed for pedals, and for speed, leverage and comfort. HT tools feature an ergonomic screwdriver grip, with an extra-long, strong standard hex/Allan wrench on one end and a ball end on the other.

  • Made of through-hardened industrial quality steel, with a comfortable grip
  • Ball headed wrench tips give access to tight spots and screws at an angle of up to 25 degrees
  • Chamfered edges on the tips for an easy and proper fit
name: Park Tool HT Long Lever Hex Wrench
